TITLE: Title
APP_DESCRIPTION: The world's leading platform that unites pet owners, fostering happy and lasting relationships between them.
LOGIN_ERROR: There has been an error. Check that your credentials are correct and try again.
NAME: Name

PASSWORD_LOWERCASE_MESSAGE: The password must contain lower case characters

PRIVACY_POLICY_DESCRIPTION: Next, we will describe the privacy policy of the application, which must be accepted before use.
INFORMATION_WE_COLLECT_DESCRIPTION: At iPetConnect, we collect limited personal information and data related to your pet, such as:
INFORMATION_WE_COLLECT_LIST_2: Pet profile information, including name, breed, age and photos.
INFORMATION_WE_COLLECT_FOOTER: This information is used to improve our services and offer you a better experience on the platform.
USE_OF_INFORMATION_DESCRIPTION: The information collected through the use of the application is used for the following purposes:
USE_OF_INFORMATION_LIST_1: Make it easy to create pet profiles and connect users with similar interests.
USE_OF_INFORMATION_LIST_2: Provide customized pet recommendations for adoption or companionship.
USE_OF_INFORMATION_LIST_3: Improve and customize the user experience in the application.
USE_OF_INFORMATION_LIST_4: Send relevant notifications and communications about our services.
SECURITY_MEASURES_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: At iPetConnect we implement various security measures to protect the information we collect:
SECURITY_MEASURES_LONG_DESCRIPTION: At iPetConnect, we take the security of your personal data very seriously. We implement various measures to protect the information we collect:
SECURITY_MEASURES_FOOTER: Additionally, we recommend that you take additional security measures, such as keeping your password secure and not sharing sensitive information on the platform.
ENCRYPTING_DESCRIPTION: We use encryption protocols to protect data transmission.
LOREM_IPSUM: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc quis ante vel urna consectetur porttitor.
RESTRICTED_ACCESS_DESCRIPTION: We limit access to personal information to authorized employees who need to process such information to provide services.
SECURITY_UPDATES_DESCRIPTION: We keep our security measures up to date to protect against potential vulnerabilities.
SERVER_PROTECTION_DESCRIPTION: Our servers are located in secure environments to prevent unauthorized access.
WANT_TO_CONTACT_US_DESCRIPTION: Your inquiries are very important to us.
NO_LIKES_RECEIVED: It seems like you haven't liked anyone you haven't matched with yet, why don't you add more information to your profile?
NO_LIKES_GIVEN: It seems like you haven't liked anyone you haven't matched with yet, why don't you play match for a while and see if you find someone?
NO_CHATS_DESCRIPTION: It seems like you haven't talked to anyone yet, why don't you start a conversation?
NO_MATCHES_DESCRIPTION: It seems like you haven't connected with anyone yet, Swipe to find people!
ENTER_EMAIL_TO_RESET: Enter email address to reset password
NO_MORE_USERS_DESCRIPTION: Try changing your match settings to adjust search filters such as distance range or age range to see if you find more people.
BUSINESS_DESCRIPTION: Society has put up so many boundaries and limitations on what's right and wrong that it's almost impossible...
PREMIUM_DESCRIPTION: Colors are good, before somebody tells you you shouldn't like pink because that's for girls.
FOCUS_DESCRIPTION: Because it's about motivating the doers. Because I'm here to follow my dreams and inspire other people.
ANIMALS_DESCRIPTION: Explore animal diversity with informative articles, curiosities and exciting stories that celebrate the beauty of the creatures of our planet.
FEATURES_DESCRIPTION: Explore the latest improvements to our app: new features and updates that optimize your experience to make it more convenient and exciting.
NEWS_DESCRIPTION: Discover top news about the animal world, from astonishing discoveries to moving stories that highlight their impact on our environment.
THE_TEAM_DESCRIPTION: Young, friendly and dynamic team in application development. We innovate with vitality and freshness in each project.
WELCOME_TO_IPETCONNECT: Welcome to the world of iPetConnect!
SUBSCRIBE_TO_OUR_NEWSLETTER_DESCRIPTION: Join our Newsletter and get news in your inbox every week! We hate spam too, so no worries about this.
UPDATE_CHECKER_INFORMATION: Click the button to update iPetConnect
TECHNOLOGY_DESCRIPTION: Discover the latest technological advances that improve the lives of your pets. Explore devices and applications for your health, care and connection in this specialized section.
PHILOSOPHY_DESCRIPTION: Exploring Animal Wisdom: Philosophical reflections on nature, behavior, and the connection between humans and animals in our world.
CONTACT_TO_CHANGE: Contact us to change this information.
ADD_POST_IMAGE: Add an image for the post
ADD_MARKER_IMAGE: Add an image for the marker
